file_content.text: Kreegan Ramar's thieving days are over, Meerko.
No more Kreegan Ramar, Meerko. He's dead.
Okay, Meerko. The underlings are out of the picture. It's time to deal with Kreegan Ramar himself.
Look what I have for you, Meerko.
Here, Meerko. This is practically all that's left.
I'm here about a Mandalorian named Kreegan Ramar.
Ooh! Meerko not sell this metal-freeze bad! Meerko keep as droid-fix table!
No more big-bad armor-man! Meerko Clan back to trade-sell!
Metal-freeze bad! Metal-freeze bad! Maybe Meerko Clan sell metal-freeze bad. Or maybe make into swing-wall for home.
Ooh. You make armor-man friend dead. Much-much happiness.
Ooh! Meerko get big-time help! Maybe Meerko Clan have much happiness after much-much sadness.
Meerko want big-bad armor-man gone! He and friends make all Meerko Clan fear. Make much trouble for droid-part sandcrawler trade-sell. Take all Meerko Clan stuff!
Ramar's smash-and-grab operation will be over soon, and you'll be able to go about your business.
No more taking.
They won't be able to toy with you anymore once they've stopped breathing.
They're done for.
Any particular reason this Mandalorian is raiding your business as opposed to some other Jawa's?
Why did Ramar target you?
No! Meerko do nothing to armor-man. Armor-man greedy. Armor-man bad.
Ooh! Much happiness! Much fear! Meerko more happy than fearing, though, yes.
Meerko like this much. Big-time help go smash-and-grab armor-man friends!
You find big-bad armor-man friends. You stop. Meerko calm. Meerko pay.
Meerko calmer now. Meerko pay.
I'll be interfering with one of my own, but Ramar's making all Mandalorians look bad.
Dishonorable for a Mando.
Meerko feel same when have to fight bad-bad Jawas.
Meerko have much fear, but much strength. Let big-bad armor-man attack sandcrawler. Armor-man take more trade-sell stuff. But Meerko make Jawas follow armor-man.
Now Meerko have location of big-bad armor-man! You get armor-man. Meerko pay lots-lots.
Much-much happiness! You take pay!
